short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fixes annoying sound problems in YouTube videos and such - e.g. audio in one channel only, or audio too quiet/loud

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A web extension that lets you fix annoying sound problems on the web e.g. YouTube videos. Sound might play only in one channel, be too quiet at maximum volume, or too loud at minimum volume.

No more "plug your headphones only halfway into the jack" suggestions!

Unfortunately, doesn't work on all websites â€” specifically, we're not allowed to use the Web Audio API from a cross-domain <audio> source. Thankfully, YouTube is not cross-domain!

This extension is identical to the SoundFixer extension released for Mozilla Firefox, with code changes implemented to render it compatible with Chrome.
